name: UINavigationItem
desc: The items that a navigation bar displays when the associated view controller is visible.

items.name: init(title: String)
items.desc: Creates a navigation item with the specified title.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a navigation item from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The navigation itemâ€™s title that displays in the navigation bar.

items.name: var largeTitleDisplayMode: UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode
items.desc: The mode for displaying the title of the navigation bar.

items.name: enum UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode
items.desc: Constants that indicate how to size the title of this item.

items.name: var backBarButtonItem: UIBarButtonItem?
items.desc: The bar button item for adding a Back button to the navigation bar.

items.name: var backButtonTitle: String?
items.desc: The custom title of the Back button.

items.name: var backButtonDisplayMode: UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode
items.desc: The display mode of the Back button.

items.name: enum UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode
items.desc: Constants that describe the display modes of the Back button.

items.name: var hidesBackButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the navigation item hides the Back button.

items.name: func setHidesBackButton(Bool, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Hides or shows the Back button, optionally animating the transition.

items.name: var prompt: String?
items.desc: A single line of text that displays at the top of the navigation bar.

items.name: var leftItemsSupplementBackButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the left items display in addition to the Back button.

items.name: var titleView: UIView?
items.desc: A custom view that displays in the center of the navigation bar when the receiver is the top item.

items.name: var leftBarButtonItems: [UIBarButtonItem]?
items.desc: An array of custom bar button items to display on the left (or leading) side of the navigation bar when the navigation item is the top item.

items.name: var leftBarButtonItem: UIBarButtonItem?
items.desc: A custom bar button item that displays on the left (or leading) edge of the navigation bar when the navigation item is the top item.

items.name: var rightBarButtonItems: [UIBarButtonItem]?
items.desc: An array of custom bar button items to display on the right (or trailing) side of the navigation bar when the navigation item is the top item.

items.name: var rightBarButtonItem: UIBarButtonItem?
items.desc: A custom bar button item that displays on the right (or trailing) edge of the navigation bar when the navigation item is the top item.

items.name: func setLeftBarButtonItems([UIBarButtonItem]?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the left bar button items, optionally animating the transition to the new items.

items.name: func setLeftBarButton(UIBarButtonItem?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the custom bar button item, optionally animating the transition to the new item.

items.name: func setRightBarButtonItems([UIBarButtonItem]?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the right bar button items, optionally animating the transition to the new items.

items.name: func setRightBarButton(UIBarButtonItem?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the custom bar button item, optionally animating the transition to the view.

items.name: var standardAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for a standard-height navigation bar.

items.name: var compactAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for a compact-height navigation bar.

items.name: var scrollEdgeAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for a standard-height navigation bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the navigation bar.

items.name: var compactScrollEdgeAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for a compact-height navigation bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the navigation bar.

items.name: var searchController: UISearchController?
items.desc: The search controller to integrate into your navigation interface.

items.name: var hidesSearchBarWhenScrolling: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app hides the integrated search bar when scrolling any underlying content.
